scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS catalogs CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE catalogs (doc_id INTEGER, xml_doc TEXT);

INSERT INTO catalogs VALUES (1, '<catalog><book id="11"><author>Chuck Palahniuk</author><title>Fight Club</title></book><book id="12"><author>Chuck Palahniuk</author><title>Survivor</title></book></catalog>'), (2, '<catalog><book id="21"><author>Bernard Werber</author><title>Les Thanatonautes</title></book></catalog>'), (3, '<catalog><book id="31"><author>Boris Vian</author><title>The Big Sleep</title></book><book id="32"><author>Boris Vian</author><title>The Lady in the Lake</title></book><book id="33"><author>Boris Vian</author><title>The World of Null-A</title></book></catalog>');
